Author: cherriepoptart
Text: I get that a lot from people who haven't seen me in a while. Strangely, I was overweight during my heroin days. Just made 5 years sober. I lost 46 lbs. But I can't  tell anyone I have an ed. I just use my busy job as an excuse. It's unreal I quit heroin cold turkey just to develop an ed ðŸ˜‚.
